eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.languages.cpp

Class CppShallowParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.framework.ShallowParserBase<EGenericParserStates>
      • eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.languages.base.CStyleShallowParserBase
        • eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.languages.cpp.CppShallowParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShallowParser

    public class CppShallowParser
extends CStyleShallowParserBase
    Shallow parser for C/C++.

    What this parser does and does not:

    • The parser recognizes types (classes, enums, interfaces), methods and attributes, and individual statements.
    • It recognizes the nesting of statements (e.g. in loops), but does not parse into the statements. For example, it recognizes an if-statement and provides the list of sub-statements, but does not provide direct access to the if-condition.
    • All preprocessor statements are parsed as meta information.
    • Template declarations are parsed as preceding meta information.
    • Forward declarations are handled as meta information.
    • We heuristically filter code generating macros, such as "CREATE_STUFF(MyClass)".
    Version:
    $Rev: 53037 $
    Author:
    $Author: kinnen $
